Package graphes

Class AffectationUtil

java.lang.Object
graphes.AffectationUtil
public class AffectationUtil extends Object
The AffectationUtil class, it represents a utility class for the affectation problem.
See Also:

    • historyWeight

      private static double historyWeight(Teenager host, Teenager visitor, List<Tuple<Teenager>> history)
      This method return a modifier for the weight of the edge between the host and the visitor, based on their history requirements.
      Parameters:
      host - the Teenager host.
      visitor - the Teenager visitor.
      history - the list of the previous affectations.
      Returns:
      a double that represents the modifier of the weight of the edge.
